testsuite.name: ProductControllerIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: test product by given id is returned when requested
test list of all products is returned when productList is requested
test list of all products by given category is returned when productList is requested by category

testsuite.system-out: --Output from test product by given id is returned when requested-- --Output from test list of all products is returned when productList is requested-- --Output from test list of all products by given category is returned when productList is requested by category--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from test product by given id is returned when requested-- --Output from test list of all products is returned when productList is requested-- --Output from test list of all products by given category is returned when productList is requested by category--

testsuite.name: ProductControllerSpec

testcase.name: validate show method retrieves product by given id
test the show method returns an error response when the parameters are incorrect
verify that a list of all products is returned as a JSON when productList is requested
test that list of all products by the given category is returned as a JSON

testsuite.system-out: --Output from validate show method retrieves product by given id-- --Output from test the show method returns an error response when the parameters are incorrect-- --Output from verify that a list of all products is returned as a JSON when productList is requested-- --Output from test that list of all products by the given category is returned as a JSON--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from validate show method retrieves product by given id-- --Output from test the show method returns an error response when the parameters are incorrect-- --Output from verify that a list of all products is returned as a JSON when productList is requested-- --Output from test that list of all products by the given category is returned as a JSON--

testsuite.name: ProductServiceSpec

testcase.name: test getProductInfoById returns product info for the given product id
test getAllProductsInfo returns all products info
test getProductInfoByCategory returns all products info for the given category
